PR

Hi, my name is Pete,
I craft things for the web

I love creativity, technology, nature and ideas. I am a user interface and front end developer currently living in Sydney, Australia. I like to capture the occasional moment and share beautiful music that I find.

I carefully forge user interfaces, mobile first, that function beautifully across a large range of devices for a variety of projects and clients. These range from company's that showcase product design like Design and Industry to larger organisations selling property nationaly such as Australand, which are built on a highly flexible, powerful and intelligent Content Management Systems like Sitecore.

I specialise in responsive techniques, utilising the tools developed by the incredible international development community, and by using progressive enhancement where ever possible to ensure the Web is moving forward.

I am currently working with the award winning team at Reactive Media
